refentry:
zp2tf Converts zeros / poles to a transfer function.
Calling Sequence
[num, den] = zp2tf (z, p, k) num = zp2tf (z, p, k)
Parameters
z:
Zeros p:
Poles k: <<<<<<< HEAD
Leading coefficient (Gain) Num:
Numerator coefficients of the transfer function den:
Denomenator coefficients of the transfer function =======
